name: Robert Evans
seeking: Seeks JV partners who can refer professional clients needing expertise and measurable engagement outcomes. Limited profile data suggests openness to cross-referral arrangements with professionals in aligned business service areas.
what_you_do: Robert Evans is the Co-Founder of ActionEra, a technology company that provides a mobile, web, and social platform for content creators, experts, authors, speakers, coaches, and entrepreneurs to leverage high engaging platforms like mobile apps to reach more people and increase their business impact and revenue.
who_you_serve: ActionEra serves content creators, experts, authors, speakers, coaches, and entrepreneurs looking to enhance their business through technology and digital marketing.
current_projects: Reach Your Peak Club membership offering discounts on software, services, and training courses.
social_proof: 21 years of experience in digital marketing and personal development, with a focus on building successful businesses.
bio: 21 years of experience in digital marketing and personal development, with a focus on building successful businesses.
business_focus: Robert Evans is the Co-Founder of ActionEra, a technology company that provides a mobile, web, and social platform for content creators, experts, authors, speakers, coaches, and entrepreneurs to leverage high engaging platforms like mobile apps to reach more people and increase their business impact and revenue. (technology for entrepreneurs)
